events.description: Yandy Diaz homers (6) on a line drive to left center field.
Brandon Lowe singles on a ground ball to center fielder TJ Friedl.
Randy Arozarena singles on a sharp line drive to left fielder Stuart Fairchild. Brandon Lowe to 3rd.
Luke Raley flies out to right fielder Jake Fraley. 1 out
Isaac Paredes doubles (1) on a sharp line drive to left fielder Stuart Fairchild. Brandon Lowe scores. Randy Arozarena to 3rd.
Josh Lowe singles on a ground ball to right fielder Jake Fraley. Randy Arozarena scores. Isaac Paredes scores.
Manuel Margot doubles (2) on a sharp ground ball to left fielder Stuart Fairchild. Josh Lowe scores. Manuel Margot to 3rd.
With Taylor Walls batting, Manuel Margot scores on a balk.
On-field Delay.
